Handle Plot Display and File Output

Source: R/wp_plot_common_components.r
in_print_and_save.Rd

Internal function that manages plot display and file saving operations. Handles both interactive display and file output in multiple formats. Ensures consistent output handling across all plot types.

Used by: in_plot_core Uses: dev.new, ggsave

File output details:

  • PNG: 300 DPI with white background

  • PDF: Uses cairo_pdf device for better font handling

  • Both files saved in 'img/' directory

Usage

in_print_and_save(plot, print = TRUE, filename = NULL, dim)

Developed by Benjamin Peeters.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.1.
